home.name: Home
home.myself: This is {alias} {'|'} {realname}, Newbie Web Developer, Frontend Developer, and Backend Developer located Indonesia, aespa fans with {bias} as bias.

paragraph.first: I am a computer science student focusing on backend development. I primarily work with Laravel and am also exploring an interest in Java Spring Boot. I'm keen to apply my developing skills.
paragraph.second: My academic journey fuels my enthusiasm to learn and grow within the tech industry, aiming to build robust and scalable solutions.

list.description: A web application for library management built with Laravel 10.10. It features complete CRUD, authentication, role configuration, and file import. | A desktop application built with native Java, aimed at simplifying inventory/warehouse management. This application features complete CRUD, authentication, and role configuration. | A desktop application built with native Java, aimed at simplifying clothing ordering and tailoring processes at the LC Busana SME. This application features complete CRUD, authentication, role configuration, profile management, and embedded storage.

closing: Thanks for scrolling, that's all folks.
